# RealVNC Installation Guide for Windows

This guide will walk you through the process of installing and setting up RealVNC on your Windows computer to enable remote desktop access.

## Prerequisites

Before you begin, ensure you meet the following requirements:

- A Windows computer running a supported version of Windows (e.g., Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7).
- Internet access.

### 1. Download RealVNC

Open your web browser and go to the RealVNC website at [https://www.realvnc.com/en/connect/download/combined/](https://www.realvnc.com/en/connect/download/combined/). Click on the "Download VNC Viewer" button.

![Download VNC Viewer](images/screenshots/realvnc-windows/screenshot-1.png)


### 2. Install VNC Viewer

Locate the downloaded installer file (e.g., `VNC-Viewer-*.exe`) and double-click it to run the installer.
Once the installation is complete, click "Finish" to exit the installer.

![Open Installer](images/screenshots/realvnc-windows/screenshot-5.png)

![Run Installer](images/screenshots/realvnc-windows/screenshot-2.png)

### 3. Follow Installation Wizard

The installation wizard will guide you through the installation process. Click on "Customize installation" and "Deselect RealVNC Server" and hit "Install".

![Customize Installation](images/screenshots/realvnc-windows/screenshot-3.png)

![Deselect RealVNC Server](images/screenshots/realvnc-windows/screenshot-4.png)


### 4. Launch RealVNC Viewer

Once the installation is complete, you can launch RealVNC Viewer by clicking on the "Launch" button or launch it from Start. If prompted to Log in/Sign Up hit "Cancel", you're **<u>NOT REQUIRED</u>** to sign up.

![Open RealVNC](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-6.png)

![Don't Sign up](images/screenshots/realvnc-windows/screenshot-6.png)

# Conclusion

Congratulations! You have successfully installed and set up RealVNC Viewer on your Windows computer. You can now use it to connect to remote computers and access their desktops.

For more advanced features and settings, refer to the [RealVNC documentation](https://www.realvnc.com/documentation/viewer/latest/).

If you encounter any issues or have questions, please refer to the RealVNC support resources for assistance.
